collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (5 total Queries, 5 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `violations`.*, COALESCE(NULLIF(students.full_name, ''), student_users.full_name) as student_name, `students`.`nisn`, `violation_categories`.`category_name`, `violation_categories`.`severity_level`, `violation_categories`.`point_deduction`, `users`.`full_name` as `reported_by_name` FROM `violations` JOIN `students` ON `students`.`id` = `violations`.`student_id` LEFT JOIN `users` as `student_users` ON `student_users`.`id` = `students`.`user_id` JOIN `violation_categories` ON `violation_categories`.`id` = `violations`.`category_id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `violations`.`reported_by` WHERE `students`.`class_id` = '1' AND `violations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `violations`.`violation_date` DESC, `violations`.`created_at` DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `violations`.*, COALESCE(NULLIF(students.full_name, ''), student_users.full_name) as student_name, `students`.`nisn`, `violation_categories`.`category_name`, `violation_categories`.`severity_level`, `violation_categories`.`point_deduction`, `users`.`full_name` as `reported_by_name` FROM `violations` JOIN `students` ON `students`.`id` = `violations`.`student_id` LEFT JOIN `users` as `student_users` ON `student_users`.`id` = `students`.`user_id` JOIN `violation_categories` ON `violation_categories`.`id` = `violations`.`category_id` JOIN `users` ON `users`.`id` = `violations`.`reported_by` WHERE `students`.`class_id` = '1' AND `violations`.`deleted_at` IS NULL ORDER BY `violations`.`violation_date` DESC, `violations`.`created_at` DESC
